raw_extractions.description: Published his first works on regulating oligopolies and monopolies, contributing to antitrust and regulatory economics.
supporting_quotes: In 1980, before Jean Tirole published his first works, most policies for regulating oligopolies or monopolies had proved unsatisfactory.
raw_extractions.raw_llm_output:
```json
{
  "events": [
    {
      "organization": null,
      "role": "Researcher and Author",
      "location": null,
      "start_date": "1980",
      "end_date": null,
      "description": "Published his first works on regulating oligopolies and monopolies, contributing to antitrust and regulatory economics.",
      "supporting_quotes": ["In 1980, before Jean Tirole published his first works, most policies for regulating oligopolies or monopolies had proved unsatisfactory."]
    },
    {
      "organization": null,
      "role": "Collaborator with Jean-Jacques Laffont",
      "location": null,
      "start_date": "1986",
      "end_date": null,
      "description": "Developed a flexible contract menu system to address asymmetric information problems.",
      "supporting_quotes": ["In 1986, with his now deceased colleague Jean-Jacques Laffont, Tirole came up with an ingenious device that proved more flexible and circumvented the problem of asymmetric information – you allow the businesses to choose from a carefully constructed menu of contracts."]
    },
    {
      "organization": null,
      "role": "Pioneer in Platform Theory",
      "location": null,
      "start_date": null,
      "end_date": null,
      "description": "Developed the theory of platforms, which now includes three of the five largest firms in the world.",
      "supporting_quotes": ["He also pioneered the theory of platforms, which now comprises three of the five largest firms in the world, as well as the majority of successful new companies."]
    },
    {
      "organization": null,
      "role": "Contributor to Antitrust Guidelines",
      "location": null,
      "start_date": null,
      "end_date": null,
      "description": "Suggested guidelines and specific rules for antitrust authorities to assess industry practices.",
      "supporting_quotes": ["On the antitrust front, he unveiled the circumstances under which industry practices such as vertical restraints, foreclosure strategies, or tacit collusion among oligopolists have the potential of hurting consumers and he suggested both guidelines and specific rules to be used by antitrust authorities."]
    },
    {
      "organization": null,
      "role": "Analyst of Co-opetition",
      "location": null,
      "start_date": null,
      "end_date": null,
      "description": "Identified the costs and benefits of cooperative arrangements among rivals in industries like payment card systems and intellectual property.",
      "supporting_quotes": ["On the co-opetition front, he identified the costs and benefits of cooperative arrangements among rivals in industries such as the payment card systems or for intellectual property; for example, while preventing cooperation on prices is laudable, cooperation on technology, including patent ‘pools’, or on system interconnection can benefit everyone."]
    }
  ]
}
```

raw_extractions.description: Undertaking a PhD in Economics at MIT, known for its intellectual vibrancy and rigorous, application-oriented economic discipline.
supporting_quotes: In 1978, I traveled across the Atlantic to undertake a PhD in Economics at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT), graduating in 1981.

raw_extractions.description: Working as a civil servant with the condition to return to France after obtaining a PhD within two years.
supporting_quotes: being a civil servant, I was given two years to obtain my PhD and return to France.

raw_extractions.description: Specialized in theory, public finance, econometrics, and international economics during PhD coursework.

```json
    {
```
```json
      "organization": "Fondation Jean-Jacques Laffont/Toulouse School of Economics (TSE)",

      "organization": "Toulouse 1 Capitole University",
      "role": "Collaboration in policy implementation",
      "location": "Toulouse, France",
      "start_date": null,

      "role": "Researcher",

      "start_date": null,

      "supporting_quotes": ["I have long been interested in other social sciences and done research at the border of, in particular, political science (independent agencies, party organization and electoral strategies), sociology (stereotypes and collective reputations, real and formal authority, cliques and collusion, modes of communication, leadership and influence) and psychology (longstanding research agenda with Roland Bénabou related to the psychological aspects of incentives on the one hand, and to motivated beliefs and identity on the other hand)."]
    }
  ]
```

```json
      "supporting_quotes": ["I was therefore very happy when, in 2011, our project to create an “Institute of Advanced Study in Toulouse (IAST)” was selected by an international jury and funded within the program “Investissements d’Avenir,”"]
    },
    {
      "organization": "Research",
      "role": "Researcher",
      "location": null,
      "start_date": null,
      "end_date": null,
      "description": "Conducted research at the intersection of economics with political science, sociology, and psychology.",
      "supporting_quotes": ["I have long been interested in other social sciences and done research at the border of, in particular, political science (independent agencies, party organization and electoral strategies), sociology (stereotypes and collective reputations, real and formal authority, cliques and collusion, modes of communication, leadership and influence) and psychology (longstanding research agenda with Roland Bénabou related to the psychological aspects of incentives on the one hand, and to motivated beliefs and identity on the other hand)."]
    }
  ]
}
```
